extension.description: This plugin allow to attach serials into HikaShop emails and orders

param.name: image_name_format
param.label: Image filename format
param.description: Format which will use for the filename. {data} will be replaced by the serial data and {id} by a unique identifier

param.name: force_download
param.label: Force download of the image
param.description: By default the image is seen as an image and won't be download by the browser

param.name: force_download_filename
param.label: Force download filename
param.description: Leave that field blank to use the serial as filename ; otherwise it will use the specified value as the filename
